**NO PORT TO FORGE PLANNED!** *(but feel free to port it by yourself and link it)*

***The mod is fully configurable to enable only changes that you like***

# Description

This mod aims to improve Minecraft's combat features. Although I added some features from the *Java Combat update snapshots*, the goal of this mod is neither to copy exactly those features, nor all of them. I also added some original features, so there are a few new new mechanics. Feel free to ask for new features or changes in the comment section =)

One of the biggest feature of this mod is the ability to change any tools/weapons attributes *(attack damage, attack speed AND attack range!)* of Minecraft vanilla and even most tools/weapons from your favorite mods!

This is a short description, full description below.

# FAQ

- **Does it work on a server?** Yes, it works on a server. File needed for **both** client **and** server!

- **Can I include it in my modpack?** Yes, you are free to include this mod into your modpack

- **For any other things:**Â Feel free to share your experience, problems, enhancement ideas in the Discord server, or directly creating issues on the GitHub

# Full description

## Sword

* Sweeping edge active only with enchantment

## Shield

* Enchantable with the table: get unbreaking
* ~~Can add thorns with anvil~~
* Reduce the arc of protection from 180 to 120 degrees
* Nerfed shield damage absorption: can absorb up to 5 damage, you take the remaining damage *(does not apply to explosions, they are still fully blocked)*
* Removed shield delay, you can now use shield to instantly block

## Axe

* Cooldown to use shield after attacking with axe
* Cooldown to use axe after using shield

## Bow

* Power is less powerful, power 5 is the same as the vanilla power 3
* ~~Either you get power to deal more damage, or you get punch/flame/infinity but not both~~

## Crossbow

* ~~Multishot can be used with piercing~~

## Flint and steel

* Using it on an entity will set it on fire for 3s, it will then target you

## Eat/Drink

* Eating/Drinking action is cancelled when attacked
* Drink potions faster

## Stacks

* Non-throwable potions can be stacked by 16
* Splash/Lingering potions can be stacked by 16, but have a 5s cooldown
* Milk buckets can be stacked by 16
* Snow balls can be stacked by 64

## Snow balls/eggs

* If thrown by a player, hit and knockback players without damage
* Knockback can be stopped with shield
* Has now a cooldown (you can't really tell the difference, but the server will)

## Tools attributes

* Changes the tools attack damage, speed and reach

Tools attributes configurable, for modded tools too!

gallery.title: Stacks
gallery.description:
Potions can be stacked by 16, as well as milk buckets.
Splash and lingering potion will trigger a cooldown on use.
Eggs and snow balls will knockback on hit.
Snow balls can be stacked by 64.

gallery.title: New Attributes
gallery.description:
Attack damage and speed have been updated.
There is now also an attack range attribute.
Some tools like axes have less range. But hoes have more.

gallery.title: Shield / Axe Mechanic
gallery.description:
Fighting with your axe will trigger a cooldown on your shield.
Using your shield will also cause a cooldown on your axe.
Use them with care during a fight, axes are heavy.
